attributes.action: Close down this petitions website as it is a waste of time
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
How many petitions have you signed on this Government Petitions web site ?

I have signed quite a few over the last couple of years, some of them referring to serious concerns the public have on certain matters. Yet of ALL the petitions I have signed, the Government, be it Tony Blair's or Gordon Brown 's, have never acted on one of them and they have just paid lip-service to them all.

I propose that this web site is a complete waste of time and it may as well be closed down for all the good it does, because the Government NEVER act on any of the concerns raised on it by the Public and quite frankly don't seem to care.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
